name: Commander (Menerv)
description:
You are the commander of a spaceship and you explore the galaxy.

Right now, you can only test the procedural generation of the galaxy.

Press left, right, up or down to navigate between regions of the galaxy.

There are 3 types of region: Void, Asteroids and System.

/!\ IF KEYBOARD DOESN'T WORK : PRESS F5 TO RELOAD THE PAGE /!\
